name: Little Kids Rock
description: Provides music education to underserved schools in the U.S.

description: Builds music and art schools in communities around the world.

name: Spotify Sound Up
description: Program supporting underrepresented podcasters and creators.

name: Ableton for Education

description: Free music education and workshops for schools.
